thread.title: Wellington
thread.title_full: Vision Direct Australia reviewed by Wellington

author: Wellington
title: Wellington
text: I had great experience with Vision Direct. My prescription glasses arrived on time with everything correct. I saved at least $ 200.00 purchasing from here. Definitely I recommend this website and I'll be back very soon to buy Sun Glasses. Very happy.
